name: ~ Magical Food Truck ~
description:
Point and Click to navigate the room!

A virtual escape room created for Sheridan College 2022 Winter Design Week. This game was created in 4 days by a small team of game design students.

Carlton Downes - Puzzle Design / Sound

Erica Mitton - Art / Sound

Cheyenne Moshtagh - Programming

Ginny Xia - Art / Programming

Pablo Valentini - Puzzle Design / UI

Wen Jing Zhy - Puzzle Design / Narrative

Music for the game was created and mixed using samples from soundtrap.com. for free use.
